backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining user profiles, tests, courses, OTP logic, Stripe checkout mappings, and access‑controlled queries with storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new user profile shapes and provides a no-op migration that forwards the old actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of all major frontend components, hooks, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining red‑blue premium color system, dark mode overrides, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Google verification meta tag, sitemap link, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all key public site pages with metadata for search indexing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, query client setup, error boundary, session-state checks, and lazy‑loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, contact info fetched from a query, and an about section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive header with navigation, user session handling, profile menu, and login/signup modals.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Provides a mobile OTP-based login flow with OTP sending, verification, error handling, and countdown logic.
frontend/src/components/MobileLoginModal: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for completing user profile details including name, mobile, email, and optional photo upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/SignupModal.tsx: Deprecated signup modal displaying a notice directing users to the mobile OTP login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and session management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileAuth.ts: Provides mobile OTP authentication with retry logic, actor readiness checks, and Internet Identity login handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, mock tests, courses, syllabi, and session state via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with a custom red‑blue theme, dark mode variables, utility classes, and animation helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing users, mock tests, courses, syllabi, and Stripe settings, gated by admin role.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays all video courses grouped by subject with duration summaries and expandable video lists.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing platform features, login/signup options, and navigation to major sections.
frontend/src/pages/MockTestsPage.tsx: Displays mock tests by subject, supports purchasing via Stripe checkout, with loading and filtering states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Shows a failure message after an unsuccessful payment and provides navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Confirms a successful payment and gives quick access to mock tests or progress.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view and update their profile details, including name, mobile, and photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays charts and metrics summarizing a user's test performance and improvement over time.
frontend/src/pages/SyllabusPage.tsx: Fetches and displays subject-wise syllabi with expandable topic lists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended colors, spacing, and custom theme utilities.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot of the project's state containing features, requirements, issues, and metadata for Exam Xpresss.
